March 2014 Meetup


Time: Starts 27 March 7:00 pm
Location: kitchen/leisure zone ABSOLVENTA Office , Greifswalder Str. 212, , 10405 Berlin (map)

Comments

Talks

None far :scream: ... but we :heart: to hear about your ideas.

News and Discussions

  • Neovim - is it worth spending time on this?
  • "Why Atom Can't Replace Vim" - emphasize the power of vim?
  • Mailing list discussion about neovim
  • In which ways is Vim awful
  • vim learn - some nice links

If you want to give a talk too, send us a tweet or a mail.

Thanks to Absolventa GmbH for hosting this event.

Matthias G端nther

Recap

This was our first meetup where we had no talks. I couldn't attend so I can only write what I heard from people saying what they did there:

  • vimrc of Christian Wellenbrock was checked
  • talk about targets.vim plugin
  • talk about tmux-complete.vim plugin
  • after talking about Neovim, Christian Wellenbrock made a commit for it

Next time, we are going to have talks again.

Matthias G端nther
